titles.title: National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2019
National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2019
A bill to modify the proof of concept commercialization program of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2019
This bill makes permanent and otherwise revises the Department of Defense's Proof of Concept Commercialization Pilot Program (which accelerates commercialization of basic research innovations). The program must focus on priority defense technology areas that attract public funding and private-sector investment.
